SELECT CLS_CD , REQ_DEPT_CD , FIN_CD , REQ_DT , SAVE_FILE_NM , UPL_FILE_NM , (SELECT FINANCE_NAME FROM RR_FINANCE WHERE FINANCE_CD=T.FIN_CD) AS FIN_NM , MAX(TRNS_STTS) AS TRNS_STTS , MAX(TRNS_STTS_NM) || '(' || SUM(STTS_CNT) || '/' || COUNT(*) || ')' AS TRNS_STTS_NM FROM ( SELECT A.CLS_CD , A.REQ_DEPT_CD , A.FIN_CD , A.REQ_DT , A.SAVE_FILE_NM , A.UPL_FILE_NM , A.TRNS_STTS , (SELECT CD_NM FROM TM_CD_INF WHERE GRP_CD='AnlySt' AND CD=A.TRNS_STTS) AS TRNS_STTS_NM , DECODE(B.TRNS_STTS, 0, 1, 1, 1, 0) AS STTS_CNT , A.REG_DT FROM TM_FLUPL_INF A, TM_RCDFL_INF B WHERE A.CLS_CD=B.CLS_CD AND A.REQ_DEPT_CD=B.REQ_DEPT_CD AND A.FIN_CD=B.FIN_CD AND A.SAVE_FILE_NM=B.SAVE_FILE_NM AND A.UPL_SPR='1'
AND B.USE_YN='X'
AND B.USE_YN='Y' AND
( A.CLS_CD=#{fList.cls_cd} AND A.REQ_DEPT_CD=#{fList.req_dept_cd} AND A.FIN_CD=#{fList.fin_cd} AND A.SAVE_FILE_NM=#{fList.save_file_nm} )
) T GROUP BY CLS_CD, REQ_DEPT_CD, FIN_CD, REQ_DT, SAVE_FILE_NM, UPL_FILE_NM ORDER BY MAX(REG_DT) ASC

SELECT CLS_CD , REQ_DEPT_CD , FIN_CD , (SELECT FINANCE_NAME FROM RR_FINANCE WHERE FINANCE_CD=T.FIN_CD) AS FIN_NM , REQ_DT , PRDLN_CD , (SELECT PRDLN_NM FROM TM_PRDLN_MNG WHERE CLS_CD=T.CLS_CD AND REQ_DEPT_CD=T.REQ_DEPT_CD AND PRDLN_CD=T.PRDLN_CD) AS PRDLN_NM , ROUND(SUM(DECODE(INSPC_SPR, '1', SCR, 0))/MAX(CTTS_CNT), 2) AS AUTO_AVG , ROUND(SUM(DECODE(INSPC_SPR, '2', SCR, 0))/MAX(CTTS_CNT), 2) AS MANUAL_AVG FROM ( SELECT A.CLS_CD , A.REQ_DEPT_CD , A.FIN_CD , A.REQ_DT , A.PRDLN_CD , B.SCR , A.CTTS_CNT , B.INSPC_SPR FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.CLS_CD , A.REQ_DEPT_CD , A.FIN_CD , A.REQ_DT , B.PRDLN_CD , B.SCRTS_NO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RR_TM001 WHERE CLS_CD=A.CLS_CD AND REQ_DEPT_CD=A.REQ_DEPT_CD AND FIN_CD=A.FIN_CD AND REQ_DT=A.REQ_DT AND PRDLN_CD=B.PRDLN_CD) AS CTTS_CNT FROM TM_FLUPL_INF A, TM_RCDFL_INF B WHERE A.CLS_CD = B.CLS_CD AND A.REQ_DEPT_CD = B.REQ_DEPT_CD AND A.FIN_CD = B.FIN_CD AND A.REQ_DT = B.REQ_DT AND A.SAVE_FILE_NM = B.SAVE_FILE_NM
AND 1 = 0
AND
( A.CLS_CD = #{fList.cls_cd} AND A.REQ_DEPT_CD = #{fList.req_dept_cd} AND A.FIN_CD = #{fList.fin_cd} AND A.REQ_DT = #{fList.req_dt} AND A.SAVE_FILE_NM = #{fList.save_file_nm} )
AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.TRNS_STTS IN ('0', '1') ) A, TM_INSPC_RSLT B WHERE A.CLS_CD = B.CLS_CD(+) AND A.REQ_DEPT_CD = B.REQ_DEPT_CD(+) AND A.FIN_CD = B.FIN_CD(+) AND A.REQ_DT = B.REQ_DT(+) AND A.PRDLN_CD = B.PRDLN_CD(+) AND A.SCRTS_NO = B.SCRTS_NO(+) ) T GROUP BY CLS_CD, REQ_DEPT_CD, FIN_CD, REQ_DT, PRDLN_CD ORDER BY PRDLN_NM ASC
